line_1: Take a week's view of Venice and the Brent,
line_2: Stare round, see nothing, and come home content.

line_1: That flies before, with scorching flames ybrent;
line_2: This sated, sullen, apt for bickerment;

line_1: That flies before, with scorching flames ybrent;
line_2: This foll'wing douts those flames with peevish discontent.
